All Implemented Interfaces:
BackgroundImageVisualizer, TerrainHeightGenerator, MatrixVisualizer, Comparable<BackgroundImageVisualizer>
public class UMatrixGenerator
extends UMatrix
implements TerrainHeightGenerator

Extends the UMatrix to provide a TerrainHeightGenerator for 3D visualisations.

Version:
